branchCategory.name: C(D)A2K, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting Single Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CA2K double acting, single non-rotating piston rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder.  This option should be used in situations when the load should not be allowed to rotate.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, and 63 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

breadCrumb.name: C(D)A2K, Non-rotating, Double Acting Single Rod
